Meet The Team

Jonas Gebhardt

Design Lead

Jonas studied Software Engineering at Hasso Plattner Institute, Germany. He has 6 years of experience in web development and design. He is passionate about creating great UX to optimize processes.

Portfolio

John Rogers

Project Manager

John studied Cognitive Science, Computer Science, and German at the University of Virginia. He is keenly interested in process, optimization, and using a range of HCI skills to effect practical improvements in existing environments.

Portfolio

Rebecca Jablonsky

Research & UX Design Lead

Rebecca has an MA in Psychology from New York University, where she conducted extensive contextual and ethnographic research. She is interested in understanding culture and systems, and designing with the needs of people in mind.

Portfolio

Jason Block

Co-Technical Lead

Jason studied mechanical engineering, robotics, and computer science at Rose-Hulman before attending Carnegie Mellon. He loves making interactive items that solve problems, whatever they may be.

Portfolio

Arthur Hong

Co-Technical Lead

Arthur is studying Business and Human-Computer Interaction at Carnegie Mellon. He has experience in both business strategy and application development and is interested in learning how technology improves business processes.
